nod.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding
nod.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: I asked her if she was ready to go, and she nodded.
nod.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to move your head down and up again once in order to greet someone or give someone a sign to do something
nod.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: The judge nodded at the foreman to proceed.
She nodded to us as she walked by.
nod.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The woman greeted us with a nod of the head.
I showed the doorman my card and he gave a friendly nod.
